verses.verse: וְיוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph הוּרַ֣ד <S%H3381><s%> was brought down מִצְרָ֑יְמָה <S%H4714><s%> to Egypt וַיִּקְנֵ֡הוּ <S%H7069><s%> bought פּוֹטִיפַר֩ <S%H6318><s%> and Potiphar סְרִ֨יס <S%H5631><s%> an officer פַּרְעֹ֜ה <S%H6547><s%> of Pharaoh שַׂ֤ר <S%H8269><s%> captain הַטַּבָּחִים֙ <S%H2876><s%> of the guard אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> an מִצְרִ֔י <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian מִיַּד֙ <S%H3027><s%> him of the hands הַיִּשְׁמְעֵאלִ֔ים <S%H3459><s%> of the Ishmeelites אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who הוֹרִדֻ֖הוּ <S%H3381><s%> which had brought him down שָֽׁמָּה׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> became יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> was with יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> was with Joseph וַיְהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> became אִ֣ישׁ <S%H582><s%> another מַצְלִ֑יחַ <S%H6743><s%> and he was a prosperous וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> became בְּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> and he was in the house אֲדֹנָ֖יו <S%H113><s%> of his master הַמִּצְרִֽי׃ <S%H4713><s%> the Egyptian

וַיַּ֣רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw אֲדֹנָ֔יו <S%H113><s%> And his master כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> that יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD אִתּ֑וֹ <S%H854><s%> caused וְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he עֹשֶׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> made all that he did יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> [was] with him and that the LORD מַצְלִ֥יחַ <S%H6743><s%> to prosper בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3027><s%> in his hand

וַיִּמְצָ֨א <S%H4672><s%> found יוֹסֵ֥ף <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph חֵ֛ן <S%H2580><s%> grace בְּעֵינָ֖יו <S%H5869><s%> in his sight וַיְשָׁ֣רֶת <S%H8334><s%> and he served אֹת֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> וַיַּפְקִדֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H6485><s%> him and he made him overseer עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over בֵּית֔וֹ <S%H1004><s%> over his house וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> and all [that] he had ל֖וֹ נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> he put בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3027><s%> into his hand

וַיְהִ֡י <S%H1961><s%> came מֵאָז֩ <S%H227><s%> And it came to pass from the time הִפְקִ֨יד <S%H6485><s%> [that] he had made him overseer אֹת֜וֹ <S%H853><s%> בְּבֵית֗וֹ <S%H1004><s%> in his house וְעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> and over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> he יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> and over all that he had ל֔וֹ וַיְבָ֧רֶךְ <S%H1288><s%> blessed יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house הַמִּצְרִ֖י <S%H4713><s%> the Egyptian's בִּגְלַ֣ל <S%H1558><s%> sake יוֹסֵ֑ף <S%H3130><s%> for Joseph's וַיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> came בִּרְכַּ֤ת <S%H1293><s%> and the blessing יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> he יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> was upon all that he had ל֔וֹ בַּבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> in the house וּבַשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <S%H7704><s%> and in the field

וַיַּעֲזֹ֣ב <S%H5800><s%> And he left כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> everything אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which לוֹ֮ בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> hand יוֹסֵף֒ <S%H3130><s%> all that he had in Joseph's וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not יָדַ֤ע <S%H3045><s%> and he knew אִתּוֹ֙ <S%H854><s%> with מְא֔וּמָה <S%H3972><s%> not ought כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> he had save הַלֶּ֖חֶם <S%H3899><s%> the bread אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אוֹכֵ֑ל <S%H398><s%> which he did eat וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> become יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph יְפֵה־ <S%H3303><s%> [person] and well תֹ֖אַר <S%H8389><s%> was [a] goodly וִיפֵ֥ה <S%H3303><s%> was handsome מַרְאֶֽה׃ <S%H4758><s%> favoured

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came אַחַר֙ <S%H310><s%> And it came to pass after הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> these things הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וַתִּשָּׂ֧א <S%H5375><s%> cast אֵֽשֶׁת־ <S%H802><s%> wife אֲדֹנָ֛יו <S%H113><s%> that his master's אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵינֶ֖יהָ <S%H5869><s%> her eyes אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at יוֹסֵ֑ף <S%H3130><s%> upon Joseph וַתֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and she said שִׁכְבָ֥ה <S%H7901><s%> Lie עִמִּֽי׃ <S%H5973><s%> with

וַיְמָאֵ֓ן ׀ <S%H3985><s%> But he refused וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> and said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife אֲדֹנָ֔יו <S%H113><s%> unto his master's הֵ֣ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold אֲדֹנִ֔י <S%H113><s%> Behold my master לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not יָדַ֥ע <S%H3045><s%> wotteth אִתִּ֖י <S%H854><s%> with מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> anything בַּבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> not what [is] with me in the house וְכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> he יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> all that he hath ל֖וֹ נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> and he hath committed בְּיָדִֽי׃ <S%H3027><s%> to my hand

אֵינֶ֨נּוּ <S%H369><s%> There גָד֜וֹל <S%H1419><s%> [There is] none greater בַּבַּ֣יִת <S%H1004><s%> in this house הַזֶּה֮ <S%H2088><s%> this מִמֶּנִּי֒ <S%H4480><s%> than וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> than I neither חָשַׂ֤ךְ <S%H2820><s%> hath he kept back מִמֶּ֙נִּי֙ <S%H4480><s%> than מְא֔וּמָה <S%H3972><s%> any thing כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo אוֹתָ֖ךְ <S%H853><s%> בַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> from me but thee because אַתְּ־ <S%H859><s%> thou אִשְׁתּ֑וֹ <S%H802><s%> [art] his wife וְאֵ֨יךְ <S%H349><s%> How אֶֽעֱשֶׂ֜ה <S%H6213><s%> how then can I do הָרָעָ֤ה <S%H7451><s%> wickedness הַגְּדֹלָה֙ <S%H1419><s%> this great הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise וְחָטָ֖אתִי <S%H2398><s%> and sin לֵֽאלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> angels

וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> become כְּדַבְּרָ֥הּ <S%H1696><s%> And it came to pass as she spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> to Joseph י֣וֹם ׀ <S%H3117><s%> day י֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> by day וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not שָׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> that he hearkened אֵלֶ֛יהָ <S%H413><s%> to her לִשְׁכַּ֥ב <S%H7901><s%> not unto her to lie אֶצְלָ֖הּ <S%H681><s%> by her לִהְי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become עִמָּֽהּ׃ <S%H5973><s%> now it

וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> happened כְּהַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And it came to pass about this time הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> one וַיָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> that [Joseph] went הַבַּ֖יְתָה <S%H1004><s%> into the house לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do מְלַאכְתּ֑וֹ <S%H4399><s%> his business וְאֵ֨ין <S%H369><s%> else אִ֜ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of the men מֵאַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H376><s%> of the men הַבַּ֛יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> was there בַּבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> inside

וַתִּתְפְּשֵׂ֧הוּ <S%H8610><s%> And she caught בְּבִגְד֛וֹ <S%H899><s%> him by his garment לֵאמֹ֖ר <S%H559><s%> saying שִׁכְבָ֣ה <S%H7901><s%> Lie עִמִּ֑י <S%H5973><s%> and he וַיַּעֲזֹ֤ב <S%H5800><s%> with me and he left בִּגְדוֹ֙ <S%H899><s%> his garment בְּיָדָ֔הּ <S%H3027><s%> in her hand וַיָּ֖נָס <S%H5127><s%> and fled וַיֵּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> and got הַחֽוּצָה׃ <S%H2351><s%> him out

וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> become כִּרְאוֹתָ֔הּ <S%H7200><s%> And it came to pass when she saw כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עָזַ֥ב <S%H5800><s%> that he had left בִּגְד֖וֹ <S%H899><s%> his garment בְּיָדָ֑הּ <S%H3027><s%> in her hand וַיָּ֖נָס <S%H5127><s%> and was fled הַחֽוּצָה׃ <S%H2351><s%> forth

וַתִּקְרָ֞א <S%H7121><s%> That she called לְאַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H376><s%> to the men בֵיתָ֗הּ <S%H1004><s%> of her house וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and spake לָהֶם֙ לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> unto them saying רְא֗וּ <S%H7200><s%> See הֵ֥בִיא <S%H935><s%> he hath brought in לָ֛נוּ אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> to the men עִבְרִ֖י <S%H5680><s%> A Hebrew לְצַ֣חֶק <S%H6711><s%> unto us to mock בָּ֑נוּ בָּ֤א <S%H935><s%> us he came in אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> to לִשְׁכַּ֣ב <S%H7901><s%> unto me to lie עִמִּ֔י <S%H5973><s%> with וָאֶקְרָ֖א <S%H7121><s%> with me and I cried בְּק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> voice גָּדֽוֹל׃ <S%H1419><s%> with a loud

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> become כְשָׁמְע֔וֹ <S%H8085><s%> And it came to pass when he heard כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הֲרִימֹ֥תִי <S%H7311><s%> that I lifted up קוֹלִ֖י <S%H6963><s%> my voice וָאֶקְרָ֑א <S%H7121><s%> and cried וַיַּעֲזֹ֤ב <S%H5800><s%> that he left בִּגְדוֹ֙ <S%H899><s%> his garment אֶצְלִ֔י <S%H681><s%> with me וַיָּ֖נָס <S%H5127><s%> and fled וַיֵּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> and got him הַחֽוּצָה׃ <S%H2351><s%> out

וַתַּנַּ֥ח <S%H3240><s%> And she laid up בִּגְד֖וֹ <S%H899><s%> his garment אֶצְלָ֑הּ <S%H681><s%> by her עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> her until בּ֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> came אֲדֹנָ֖יו <S%H113><s%> until his lord אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בֵּיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1004><s%> home

וַתְּדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> And she spake אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> about כַּדְּבָרִ֥ים <S%H1697><s%> unto him according to these words הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying בָּֽא־ <S%H935><s%> which thou hast brought אֵלַ֞י <S%H413><s%> about הָעֶ֧בֶד <S%H5650><s%> servant הָֽעִבְרִ֛י <S%H5680><s%> The Hebrew אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom הֵבֵ֥אתָ <S%H935><s%> unto us came in לָּ֖נוּ לְצַ֥חֶק <S%H6711><s%> unto me to mock בִּֽי׃

וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> become כַּהֲרִימִ֥י <S%H7311><s%> And it came to pass as I lifted up קוֹלִ֖י <S%H6963><s%> my voice וָאֶקְרָ֑א <S%H7121><s%> and cried וַיַּעֲזֹ֥ב <S%H5800><s%> that he left בִּגְד֛וֹ <S%H899><s%> his garment אֶצְלִ֖י <S%H681><s%> with me וַיָּ֥נָס <S%H5127><s%> and fled הַחֽוּצָה׃ <S%H2351><s%> out

וַיְהִי֩ <S%H1961><s%> become כִשְׁמֹ֨עַ <S%H8085><s%> heard אֲדֹנָ֜יו <S%H113><s%> And it came to pass when his master אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דִּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> the words אִשְׁתּ֗וֹ <S%H802><s%> of his wife אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבְּרָ֤ה <S%H1696><s%> which she spake אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> to him לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> unto him saying כַּדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> After this manner הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> another עָ֥שָׂהּ <S%H6213><s%> did לִ֖י עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5650><s%> thy servant וַיִּ֖חַר <S%H2734><s%> was kindled אַפּֽוֹ׃ <S%H639><s%> to me that his wrath

וַיִּקַּח֩ <S%H3947><s%> took אֲדֹנֵ֨י <S%H113><s%> master יוֹסֵ֜ף <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph's אֹת֗וֹ <S%H853><s%> וַֽיִּתְּנֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H5414><s%> him and put him אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> court הַסֹּ֔הַר <S%H5470><s%> prison מְק֕וֹם <S%H4725><s%> a place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> where [אֲסוּרֵי כ] (אֲסִירֵ֥י <S%H631><s%> were confined ק) הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> where the king's אֲסוּרִ֑ים <S%H631><s%> [were] bound וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> become שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> was there בְּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> court הַסֹּֽהַר׃ <S%H5470><s%> prison

וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> But the LORD אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> was with יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> was with Joseph וַיֵּ֥ט <S%H5186><s%> and shewed אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> about חָ֑סֶד <S%H2617><s%> him mercy וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> and gave חִנּ֔וֹ <S%H2580><s%> him favour בְּעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight שַׂ֥ר <S%H8269><s%> of the keeper בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> court הַסֹּֽהַר׃ <S%H5470><s%> prison

וַיִּתֵּ֞ן <S%H5414><s%> committed שַׂ֤ר <S%H8269><s%> And the keeper בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> court הַסֹּ֙הַר֙ <S%H5470><s%> prison בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> hand יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> to Joseph's אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָ֣אֲסִירִ֔ם <S%H615><s%> all the prisoners אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> who בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> court הַסֹּ֑הַר <S%H5470><s%> prison וְאֵ֨ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who עֹשִׂים֙ <S%H6213><s%> and whatsoever they did שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> there ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become עֹשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> there he was the doer
